scripts.check:status: sh -c 'rg -n "CANCELED|CANCELLED" lib app pages -g"*.{ts,tsx,js,mjs,cjs}" --glob "!lib/status.ts" --glob "!lib/bookingStatus.ts" --glob "!eslint.config.mjs" --glob "!node_modules/**" --glob "!.next/**" --glob "!dist/**"; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo "Found forbidden status literals (use lib/status.ts constants instead)."; exit 1; elif [ $code -eq 1 ]; then echo "OK: no forbidden status literals found."; exit 0; else exit $code; fi'
scripts.db:check: npm run db:audit && git diff --quiet docs/MIGRATION_RISK_REGISTER.md
